projectPromotions.title: Romantic surprise for Valentines day (...but it will work well on every other day!)
projectPromotions.content: You don't know how to make a moment special? No need to worry. You have an ally in Conrad Connect. Automate your music, lighting and sockets for surprising your loved one.

projectPromotions.title: Get your home ready for your absence
projectPromotions.content: Prepare your home for your absence with the touch of a smart button. Security systems, lights, and even the door lock can be controlled with just one click.

projectPromotions.title: More motivation during training
projectPromotions.content: Motivate yourself and others by sharing your step count with a text message once you reach a certain goal.

projectPromotions.title: The perfect start to the day
projectPromotions.content: Automate your heating, music and lighting to easily wake up and start the day comfortably.
